code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/posts';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};var create=function create(newObject,_ref){var token=_ref.token;var config={headers:{Authorization:token}};var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject,config);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(res){return res.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
